item.title: 交易员在 2025 年对特朗普下的每一个赌注几乎都失败了
item.description: 12 月，在唐纳德-特朗普重返白宫之前，市场已达成共识：做多美元，做空政府债券，看好美国股票而非世界其他地区。【原文：In December, before Donald Trump’s return to the White House, a market consensus was building: Long the dollar, short government bonds, and favor American stocks over the rest of the world.】

item.title: 私人信贷模仿 CLO 利用保险公司的万亿资金
item.description: 私营信贷业正逐步接近其保持增长所需的数万亿美元保险金额。【原文：The private credit industry is drawing closer to the trillions of dollars in insurance holdings it needs to keep growing.】

item.title: 阿联酋航空在延误中对波音公司的时间表愈发谨慎
item.description: 阿联酋航空围绕波音公司的 777X 打造了自己的未来机队，目前已订购了 205 架飞机。但在这架巨型飞机的商业首秀多次推迟后，阿联酋航空对其时间表也变得更加谨慎。【原文：Emirates has built its future fleet around Boeing Co.’s 777X, with 205 units on order. But after numerous delays to the giant aircraft’s commercial debut, the airline has also become more cautious about its timeline.】

item.title: 债券交易员等待可能证明美联储谨慎态度的非农就业数据
item.description: 在就业数据公布之前，美国国债在窄幅区间内交投，该数据可能会助长对决策者将保持谨慎的押注，利率举措将被搁置数月之久。【原文：US Treasuries traded in a narrow range ahead of jobs data that may fuel bets policymakers will stay cautious, with interest-rate moves on hold for months.】

item.title: 阿联酋计划向法国数据中心投资高达 500 亿欧元
item.description: 据法国官员透露，一家来自阿拉伯联合酋长国的基金计划斥资 300 亿至 500 亿欧元（312 亿至 520 亿美元）在法国新建一个数据中心园区。【原文：A fund from the United Arab Emirates is planning to spend between €30 billion and €50 billion ($31.2 billion and $52 billion) on a new campus for data centers in France, according to French officials.】

item.title: 美国国际开发署（USAID）在肯尼亚的裁员揭示了生命和美国在全球影响力面临的风险
item.description:
冻结援助资金会危及重要的医疗保健计划以及与美国在世界各地的重要盟友的安全合作

。【原文：

Freezing aid funds jeopardizes critical healthcare programs and security cooperation with important US allies around the world

】

item.title: 对冲基金杉树在三十年后返还外部现金
item.description: 据彭博新闻社（Bloomberg News）看到的一封信称，总部位于纽约的对冲基金 Fir Tree Partners —；以煽动针对陷入困境的公司的激进运动而闻名—；正在将外部资本返还给投资者。【原文：New York-based hedge fund Fir Tree Partners — known for instigating activist campaigns against distressed companies — is returning outside capital to investors, according to a letter seen by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 通用汽车、福特股价低廉是有原因的，因为风险在增加
item.description: 通用汽车公司和福特汽车公司是 S&P 500 指数中最便宜的股票之一。但华尔街分析师表示，这并不意味着它们有买入的机会，随着这两家百年汽车制造商前景面临的风险越来越大，他们对这两家公司的股票正迅速产生厌恶情绪。【原文：General Motors Co. and Ford Motor Co. are among the cheapest stocks in the S&P 500 Index. But that doesn’t make them buying opportunities, say Wall Street analysts, who are rapidly souring on the century-old carmakers’ shares as risks around their outlooks grow.】

item.title: 劳资谈判危及租赁合同，芬兰航空酝酿削减飞行员职位
item.description: 芬兰航空公司（Finnair Oyj）表示，由于芬兰未解决的工业行动危及到与其合作伙伴的合作协议，该公司可能被迫裁减多达 90 名执行湿租赁合同的飞行员。【原文：Finnair Oyj said it may be forced to cut as many as 90 pilots operating its wet lease contracts after unresolved industrial action in Finland jeopardizes the cooperation agreement with its partner.】

item.title: 被 "实权派 "拥抱后，Tether 启动交易机器
item.description: 价值 1,400 亿美元的稳定币巨头 Tether Holdings Ltd. 的首席执行官保罗-阿多诺（Paolo Ardoino）上周末在圣萨尔瓦多向聚集在一起的加密货币忠实粉丝们发出了胜利的信息。【原文：Paolo Ardoino, the chief executive officer of $140 billion stablecoin giant Tether Holdings Ltd., had a triumphant message for the crypto faithful gathered in San Salvador late last week.】

item.title: 前景乐观，新交所股价创 17 年最高水平
item.description: 由于新加坡交易所的盈利和前景激发了投资者的热情，该交易所股价攀升至 2007 年 12 月以来的最高水平。【原文：Singapore Exchange Ltd. shares climbed to their highest level since December 2007 as the bourse’s earnings and outlook fanned investor enthusiasm.】

item.title: 石油战略》：制裁叠加，俄罗斯面临迫在眉睫的油轮危机
item.description: 彭博社石油策略师朱利安-李（Julian Lee）写道，由于美国的制裁，俄罗斯似乎正处于石油货运问题的风口浪尖。【原文：Russia appears to be on the cusp of a debilitating oil-freight transportation problem because of US sanctions, writes Bloomberg oil strategist Julian Lee.】

item.title: 印度央行行长称外汇政策旨在保持稳定和效率
item.description: 印度央行新任行长在首次就最近几周货币大幅下滑发表评论时表示，印度央行的外汇政策始终保持一贯性，其目标是在不损害市场效率的情况下保持稳定。【原文：Indian central bank’s foreign exchange policy has remained consistent and aims to maintain stability without hurting market efficiency, its new chief said, in his first comments on the currency which has seen a sharp slide in recent weeks.】

item.title: 国泰君安称欧洲终于迎来债券年
item.description: 国泰君安全球顾问公司（State Street Global Advisors）的策略师认为，欧洲债券今年的表现有望跑赢大盘，因为美国将继续实施贸易关税威胁，迫使央行降低利率。【原文：European bonds are primed to outperform this year because the US will follow through with threatened trade tariffs, forcing the central bank to slash interest rates, according to State Street Global Advisors strategists.】

item.title: 据说 SMFG 和 SBI 正计划成立合资公司，为日本新兴富裕企业服务
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，三井住友金融集团和 SBI 控股公司正在考虑联手创办一家公司，为那些在日本并非最富有但仍然富裕的客户提供数字财富管理服务。【原文：Sumitomo Mitsui Financial Group Inc. and SBI Holdings Inc. are considering teaming up to start a business that will provide digital wealth management services for customers that aren’t the richest in Japan but still prosperous, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长莱恩警告不要过分关注中性利率
item.description: 欧洲中央银行首席经济学家菲利普-莱恩（Philip Lane）表示，在决定降低借贷成本的幅度时，欧洲中央银行将仔细研究经济数据，而不会花太多时间考虑所谓的中性利率，因为中性利率经常被吹捧为指路明灯。【原文：The European Central Bank will scrutinize economic data when deciding how far to lower borrowing costs, and won’t spend too much time thinking about the so-called neutral rate that’s often touted as a guiding star, Chief Economist Philip Lane said.】

item.title: 奇货可居：菲利普-莱恩谈欧元区的大问题（播客）
item.description: 奇货可居：菲利普-莱恩谈欧元区的大问题（播客）【原文：Odd Lots: Philip Lane on the Euro-zone’s Big Problems (Podcast)】

item.title: HIG 拟斥资 9.08 亿美元将加拿大 Converge 公司与美国同行合并
item.description: HIG Capital LLC 将以 13 亿加元（9.08 亿美元）的价格收购 Converge Technology Solutions Corp.，这将导致这家 IT 和云计算公司与一家美国竞争对手合并。【原文：HIG Capital LLC will buy Converge Technology Solutions Corp. in a C$1.3 billion ($908 million) deal, that will lead to the IT and cloud computing company being merged with a US rival.】

item.title: 英国央行标明英国经济增长面临风险，英镑将遭受更多损失
item.description: 英国央行的最新政策决定加深了投资者对英国经济增长乏力的担忧，因此他们认为英镑将进一步走软。【原文：Investors are positioning for more weakness in the pound after the Bank of England’s latest policy decision cemented their concerns about sputtering UK growth.】

item.title: 特朗普移民和关税言论激怒印度汽车供应商
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普威胁对墨西哥征收高额关税，并计划限制移民，这对印度汽车零部件供应商及其在最大出口市场扩张的雄心构成了双管齐下的威胁。【原文：US President Donald Trump’s threats of steep tariffs on Mexico and his planned curbs on immigration present a two-pronged threat to Indian auto parts suppliers and their ambitions to expand in their biggest export market.】

item.title: 华沙证券交易所今年首次公开募股，诊断公司股价飙升 24
item.description: 波兰实验室运营商 Diagnostyka SA 在华沙首次公开募股时股价大涨，标志着今年迄今为止欧洲最大的首次公开募股之一有了一个坚实的开端。【原文：Diagnostyka SA’s shares surged in the Polish laboratory operator’s Warsaw debut, signaling a solid start for one of Europe’s biggest initial public offerings so far this year.】

item.title: 德国保守党在选举民调中扩大对极右翼的领先优势
item.description: 在一项新的民意调查中，德国保守派反对党的支持率略有上升，这表明基民盟领导人弗里德里希-默尔茨（Friedrich Merz）因推动更严格的移民规定而引发的争议并没有损害他的选举前景。【原文：Support for Germany’s conservative opposition gained slightly in a new poll, suggesting CDU leader Friedrich Merz’s controversial push for tougher migration rules hasn’t hurt his election prospects.】

item.title: 黄金价格创下历史新高，中国央行增购黄金
item.description: 尽管贵金属飙升至年初以来的新高，中国央行仍在 1 月份连续第三个月扩大了黄金储备。【原文：China’s central bank expanded its gold reserves for a third month in January, even as the precious metal surged to new high since the beginning of the year.】

item.title: 德国经济用美国贸易顺差新高诱惑特朗普
item.description: 去年，德国对美国的货物贸易顺差创下新高，就在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普威胁要对欧洲征收关税之际，这一事态发展很可能会激怒他。【原文：Germany’s goods-trade surplus with the US hit a new high last year, a development that’s likely to irk President Donald Trump just as he threatens tariffs on Europe.】

item.title: 土耳其中央银行上调 2025 年底通胀预期
item.description: 土耳其央行上调了今年年底的通胀预期，这让分析师们大吃一惊，他们普遍预计今年的通胀率将保持不变。【原文：Turkey’s central bank raised its year-end inflation forecast for this year, surprising analysts who were largely expecting the number to stay the same.】

item.title: 印度中央银行推迟拟议的贷款人流动性规则
item.description: 印度储备银行已推迟实施针对贷款机构的流动性监管建议，这可能会阻碍他们增加信贷的努力。【原文：The Reserve Bank of India has delayed the implementation of proposed liquidity regulations for lenders that may have hampered their efforts to boost credit.】

item.title: Norinchukin 因银行抛售外国债券而亏损 93 亿美元
item.description: 由于不断减持外国债券，在全球高利率影响下苦苦挣扎的日本贷款机构 Norinchukin 银行报告亏损 1.4 万亿日元（93 亿美元）。【原文：Norinchukin Bank, the Japanese lender struggling from the fallout of high global interest rates, reported losses of ¥1.4 trillion ($9.3 billion) as it kept shedding foreign bond holdings.】

item.title: 德国工业生产因汽车而出现五个月来最大降幅
item.description: 2024 年底，德国工业生产创下五个月来最大降幅，延续了制造业的萎靡不振，尽管其他数据带来了企稳的希望。【原文：German industrial production fell the most in five months at the end of 2024, extending the manufacturing sector’s malaise even as other data offer hope of a stabilization.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市将从历史纪录下滑，英镑维持在 1.24 美元上方
